name: SolarBright Pro Street Light
shortDescription: High-performance solar street light for urban areas
description: The SolarBright Pro Street Light is our flagship product designed for municipal and commercial applications. It features high-efficiency monocrystalline solar panels, intelligent motion detection, and weather-resistant construction. Perfect for streets, parking lots, and public spaces.

name: SolarPath Driveway Illuminator
description: The SolarPath Driveway Illuminator provides elegant, reliable lighting for residential driveways and pathways. With its sleek design and durable construction, it enhances both safety and curb appeal while requiring zero electricity from the grid.

specifications.Installation: Ground stake or surface mount options

name: SolarGlow Exterior Wall Light
shortDescription: Modern solar-powered wall lights for home exteriors
description: The SolarGlow Exterior Wall Light combines modern aesthetics with practical functionality. Easily mounted on any exterior wall, it provides ambient lighting with adjustable brightness settings and an optional motion detection mode for security purposes.
